modName: The Mages Tower - solitude lighthouse playerhome
summary: a redesign of the frostcragspire set in a way that can be not only small and easy to navigate but has all of the things one could need from a bit of decor to all crafting toolsets that are of the non dlc type as well as a bedroom and no need for teleporters or waiting for rooms to load
descriptionHtml:
a redesign of the frostcragspire set in a way that can be not only small and easy to navigate but has all of the things one could need from a bit of decor to all crafting toolsets that are of the non dlc type as well as a bedroom and no need for teleporters or waiting for rooms to load

i was unhappy with the fact there were not any redesigns of the best home in all of gaming to be found that were not heavily overdone or had way to many things to learn (teleporters, item locations, what room held what items,etc) so i redesigned the tower as a lighthose in skyrim and made it as simple as posible to learn the home.

it took me over 2 months of redesigning this mod before i was happy with it and i was going for under 30 items so i could easily port it to xbox or ps3 but it is still managable for one who knows what they are doing with a batch file (that is not me) at 75 items total and no modifiaction to the area needing to be done other than removal of the 2 items for the quest in this area (or move them to the ground level)
author: Laschiel DeLaFey
